blizzardCharInfo.name: Ana
blizzardCharInfo.desc: This Overwatch stalwart has emerged from years of seclusion to defend a new generation.

blizzardCharInfo.name: Ashe
blizzardCharInfo.desc: The leader of the notorious Deadlock Gang menaces the American Southwest.

blizzardCharInfo.name: D.VA
blizzardCharInfo.desc: A former pro gamer who now pilots a state-of-the-art mech in defense of her homeland.

blizzardCharInfo.name: Bastion
blizzardCharInfo.desc: A transforming robot who explores the world; fascinated by nature, but wary of humanity.

blizzardCharInfo.name: Junkrat
blizzardCharInfo.desc: An explosives-obsessed freak who lives to cause chaos and destruction.

blizzardCharInfo.name: Widowmaker
blizzardCharInfo.desc: A perfect assassin: patient, ruthlessly efficient, and without emotion or remorse.

blizzardCharInfo.name: Roadhog
blizzardCharInfo.desc: A ruthless killer with tremendous strength and a reputation for cruelty and wanton destruction.

mapleCharInfo.name: Striker
mapleCharInfo.desc: These henchmen are just disappointing. They rely on magic or gadgets, and even worse, they refuse to attack me one at a time!

mapleCharInfo.name: Berserker
mapleCharInfo.desc: My kind of Anger Management is thinking of some things before I jump into battle. My friends getting hurt, bullies insulting me, people that talk during a show...

mapleCharInfo.name: Runeblade
mapleCharInfo.desc: Every time someone tries to rush the Storm Sigil, they don't get it quite right and forget they're holding a metal sword!

mapleCharInfo.name: Thief
mapleCharInfo.desc: I rob from the rich and give to the poor! Most of it goes to the poor, anyway. After expenses, so many expenses...

mapleCharInfo.name: Heavy Gunner
mapleCharInfo.desc: The hardest part is knowing when to stop firing. Some people stop when they see the Mushroom drop.  But I like grilled mushrooms, soooo..

mapleCharInfo.name: Soul Binder
mapleCharInfo.desc: Animus energy isn't magic, it's a deep, spiritual connection to an ancient power... that I use to summon orbs that blow things up.

mapleCharInfo.name: Wizard
mapleCharInfo.desc: I mean, technically everything is flammable eventually. Also, sorry about the drapes. And the rug. And the couch.

mapleCharInfo.name: Priest
mapleCharInfo.desc: Okay everyone, remember! Don't get too far away from me, follow the Knight's lead and please stay out of the fire. GET OUT OF THE F-
